评论详情: It's great

recently got heavy into HLM and had to get Jacket's jacket. this one is actually really good, its wool so ofc its for like 50 degrees and below, super comfy, i did have a snap button fall apart but i just put it back and gave each of the bottom half of the snaps a decent smack with a mallet and havent had any issues since, so id recommend doing that as soon as you get the jacket. ive worn it practically every day, mostly at my factory job and hanging with friends on the weekend. hasn't had and durability issues or literally anything negative other than the bottom half of the snaps. for the price id definitely recommend it either if you want a good fall/winter jacket or are just a HLM fan. the sizing is pretty true to size if not slightly big, buy whatever size you usually get and you'll be happy, just make sure to whack those snaps so they stay on well, dont do it to hard though ofc.

Looks good for Hotline Miami. The outside of the jacket is super itchy. The inside does have a very thin lining. Overall, not really what I expected, but still works. I just don’t think it was a good value for the price
The jacket looks nice, is sewn well, and is comfortable. My high school son wanted it for Halloween, but likes it so much he plans to wear it quite a bit.

Just one size too big

Looks amazing. Fits perfectly. Very warm and comfortable. Exactly what I was hoping for. Very fast shipping too.

评论概述: Great Quality for Hotline Miami Cosplay, Order a Size Down!
评论详情: Came on time and fit perfectly - saw comments to order a size down and I did, would recommend it that way! Fit perfectly as size down from my regular and it would've been a bit baggy otherwise so definitely follow the comments advice! The full costume came out great.
Looks and feels nice but it is a bit tight for me as a 300 pound man at 3xl
my son loves this jacket

It is very high quality but I wear XL for most things because of comfort can easily fit into a Large but this felt like a medium when I ordered XL. get a couple sizes larger that what you normally wear.
“Jacket” is instantly recognizable and perfect for an easy cosplay!

I loved the jacket, I have no real issues with the craftsmanship or anything, but just a heads up to anyone thinking about buying, it does run about a size or two too small.  I'm 6'1 and I usually order an XL so I went ahead and ordered a size up. It fits, but it's a pretty snug fit which I know some people might like, and if you're that person go ahead and size up once. I on the other hand personally prefer my jackets to be a bit more on the loose end, and if you're the same way then I'd advice going 2 sizes up. Other than that, great product and I absolutely recommend it to any Hotline Miami fan!
Fit small even tho i got it up sized and there was lots of lose threads and makes it itchy and pokes alot

评论概述: The price was worrisome, but well worth it!
评论详情: I got this jacket on-sale for $75, which was still a bit out of my price range. Sales tax sent it above $80. I was pretty worried, especially since buying these generic-brand clothes on Amazon tends to be a risky gamble. I can sum it up here, though: *get this one.* I saw a few reviews saying the sleeves were itchy, but there's sleek fabric inside the sleeves that prevent any itchiness. It's thick and warm, and the stitching is nice and durable. The buttons are sturdy, I couldn't find any loose threads, and there are interior pockets! I got extra large since it was the same price and I love oversized clothing. I'm 5'2", and I'm swimming in it. Goes great with a rooster mask.
Got it for my son for Christmas and he won’t take it off.  We love Hotline Miami in this house
A mi hijo le encanto
Very good jacket. A little itchy, but it's super nice
The jacket is very nice and comfortable top quality thanks
The wool exterior wasn’t the most comfy, but the inside was super comfortable!

Sizing was about what I expected. I really don't know how to read the measurement charts so I just picked medium because I wear large and medium shirts (I am a 5' 9" male, kinda skinny). Could have gotten away with a large but I am happy enough. The jacket itself is pretty nice! It is thinner than I expected but still keeps me pretty warm and the build quality is better than I expected. Maybe slightly pricey but for what it is and being Prime eligible I am happy with my purchase :)

The inner lining where the torso and arm met is ripped on the left arm, I didn't notice it when I first tried it on but when I was putting it on the second time. It's fixable thankfully I know how to sew but I paid $92 US dollars for it so you know annoying. Otherwise it's good, it's wool so a little bit itchy but I don't have any complaints besides that. Also get a size up, I'm only 5'2 and the large fit me perfectly thankfully didn't get a medium think that would have been to slim fit.
I ordered it and it came the next day. Super fast delivery. My son wanted this and he is thrilled about the jacket.

评论概述: A great looking jacket with a few issues
评论详情: This jacket fits nice and looks great, but it does have a few problems worth considering. For one, the jackets sleeves are wildly itchy: I washed it pretty much as soon as I got it to see if it would make the sleeves more comfortable but it didn't change it at all. The other problem is the buttons are quite weak and tend to snap in two, this is easily fixable by simply pushing them back together, but it is likely to occur more than once so I suggest keeping an eye out for pieces of button until you fix it permanently with some sort of extra strength glue. Despite these issues, I would heavily recommend this jacket, especially for fans of hotline miami.
Nice look
This jacket was exactly what my son was looking for. It fit him perfectly. Very good quality.

评论详情: A smidge smaller than anticipated, but fits me perfectly! High quality jacket!

The Jacket itself is identical to the picture but the "wool" that it's made of is pretty cheap and stinks of plastic. It looks nice but I could say my only critique would be the quality of the material.
10/10 It's really great

评论概述: Such a comfortable and accurate looking jacket!
评论详情: If you're getting this for cosplay use, or for general wear, this jacket is awesome for both. I will say that the wool of the jacket can be really itchy feeling and can kinda get that itch around your neck, but just wash it carefully with delicate settings and it'll feel way less aggravating. The jacket has a satin inside and can keep you warm pretty dang well, it also has nice big pockets on both the outside AND inside! Overall I think this is a great jacket, this is the one you should buy.

评论概述: Perfect for a Hotline Miami Cosplay.
评论详情: Little on the smaller side but it’s good for what I bought it for.

The actual jacket itself is rather nice. It was comfortable and not itchy. However, when I took it out of the package, I noticed that one of the buttons were broken/missing. It was the 4th from the bottom and I could not find it in the packaging anywhere. It is rather disappointing, but I would still suggest this one if other people were wanting this one since I have not seen other customers have this issue. I would also suggest ordering a size up.

评论详情: Meant for the athletic fit, it fits best if you have broad shoulders and no gut. A 2xl will fit like an xl. It does have a strong smell to it so i recommend spraying it to remove wrinkles and odor.
Gift for one son to the other. Very nice material.
Jacket is great quality, very well made.  Ordered for my teen grandson who absolutely loves it. It arrived quickly and is just as described.  Great purchase!

Looks exactly like the photo. Has silk on the inside, two inner pockets, and it is very cozy and warm. I'd say it's a perfect replica of Jacket's letterman, in my opinion. I'd definitely recommend it if you're a Hotline Miami/Payday fan. It's great for cosplay, but honestly it's great for regular wear, too.
